content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 1/4 cups cubed whole wheat bread" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a large bowl, combine bread and milk, and set aside to soak for 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "bread"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "milk"@38:42 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "set aside"@48:57 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to soak for 5 minutes"@58:79 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Then stir in egg, butter, raisins, mixed fruit, brown sugar, nutmeg, and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "stir in"@8:15 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "egg"@16:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "butter"@21:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "raisins"@29:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mixed fruit"@38:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "brown sugar"@51:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "nutmeg"@64:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cinnamon"@76:84 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Press the mixture into a  9-inch square baking pan.
5) Bake in preheated oven until golden and firm to touch, about 35 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until golden and firm to touch"@26:56 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "35 minutes"@64:74 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Leave in baking pan to cool, then cut into squares.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Leave"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "baking pan"@12:22 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "to cool"@23:30 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "cut"@37:40 / AC
		:todo ( "squares"@46:53 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
